hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.master.business.EntityMaster(entity.entityId ,label.localeId,label.labelName) from org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpEntity entity, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpLabelEntity label where entity.entityId = label.lookUpEntity.entityId and label.localeId=:localeId and entity.entityType=:entityType

select new org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpMaster( lookup.lookUpId,lookupvalue.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueEntity lookup, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpEntity entity, org.mifos.application.master.business.LookUpValueLocaleEntity lookupvalue where entity.entityType=:entityType and lookup.lookUpEntity.entityId =entity.entityId and lookup.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId
